The claim was verified by conducting a s: 1212 pillars Rameshwaram temple', which led to the discovery that the Ramanathaswamy temple in Rameshwaram, Tamil Nadu, does have an outer corridor with 1212 pillars. The authenticity of the claim was furthe: To determine the origin of the photograph, a reverse-image search was conducted, which revealed that the photo is actually of Hoshang Shah's tomb in Mandu, Madhya Pradesh. This discrepancy raised doubts about the accuracy of the claim.
